source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot shows a view looking up at a blue sky filled with small, white clouds. The perspective is framed by the edges of a square opening, like a skylight or an open roof. The clouds are in motion, drifting across the sky.

source_caption_data.final_feedback: The clouds do not appear to be moving; rather, the perceived motion is an optical illusion resulting from the movement of the camera.
